Metadata.Title: CVE-2022-4055 affecting package xdg-utils for versions less than 1.2.1-3
Metadata.Description: CVE-2022-4055 affecting package xdg-utils for versions less than 1.2.1-3. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package xdg-utils is earlier than 1.2.1-3, affected by CVE-2022-4055
